description: Tonight the Major is back with us in the War Chest and he's brought along another hot Marine to give a little helping hand. Sledge was one of the Major's favorites and what a firecracker this one is. He wastes no time getting right down to business and he's so animated and into what he's doing that you won't want to stop watching. He also likes some ass play and he really gets into working his nice smooth hole. Sledge is just back from Iraq and is ready for action.
title: Sledge
